newsitem.title: USA: Negotiated muni sales total $178 mln for Sept 5.
newsitem.headline: Negotiated muni sales total $178 mln for Sept 5.

text.p: Scheduled negotiated municipal bond sales, depending on market conditions, could total $177.7 million in three sales Thursday, according to Reuters Municipal Bond Information Group.
The largest expected issue is a $167.2 million Piedmont Municipal Power Authority, S.C., issue through JP Morgan Securities Inc.
Another $81.2 million Harrisburg Authority, Pa., issue, through PNC Securities, is on the possible list for Thursday and may come depending on market conditions.
